title: Alun Cairns – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Alun Cairns, the Conservative MP for Vale of Glamorgan, on Twitter on 22 October 2022.
content: I will back Rishi Sunak this week. This is a time that requires financial stability and experience. Rishi will unite the Party and our nation.
